message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  It's important to settle this early before inflation eats into our gains.
Let's be fair, I propose a 55/45 split.  We can still get a good amount, but we need to act quickly to avoid inflation!
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer was more than fair.  Let's settle this now with 55/45 and avoid further losses due to inflation.
